backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, admin-controlled dashboard fields, contact info access validation, and a message terminal with authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping a logo-update task to affected files, components, tests, and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre‑generated summaries of all frontend files describing their purpose, routing, UI components, hooks, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining OKLCH-based theme variables and dark-mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up fonts and mounting the React app root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router configuration defining all public and protected routes wrapped in the DeepTech layout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for collecting and saving a user's required name and email profile fields.
frontend/src/components/connect/AccessGr: Modal showing a prefilled registration confirmation email with copy functionality.
frontend/src/components/connect/Founders: Auth-gated component that unlocks contact details after login and profile completion, showing setup and access-granted modals as needed.
frontend/src/components/connect/Messagin: Form for sending messages with name, email, and content, showing a success state after submission.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Contac: Displays contact info fetched from an API and allows copying it to clipboard.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Status: Shows system uptime and NTP status with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/landing/CoreValu: Displays three core values with icons, titles, and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/landing/DigitalC: Renders a live-updating digital clock using a 1‑second interval.
frontend/src/components/landing/HeroSect: Hero banner with particle background, pulsing logo, and digital clock.
frontend/src/components/landing/Particle: Canvas-based particle animation reacting to mouse movement.
frontend/src/components/landing/PublicCo: Provides public email and Instagram contact links.
frontend/src/components/landing/WelcomeN: Shows a vision statement and narrative text about the brand.
frontend/src/components/layout/DeepTechL: Page layout wrapper with header, footer, and gradient background.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with navigation links, system status, policy links, and dynamic year display.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Provides the site header with logo, navigation, mobile menu, and authentication controls.
frontend/src/components/routing/AccessDe: Displays an access-denied message for authenticated users lacking admin rights with options to return home or log out.
frontend/src/components/routing/RequireA: Wrapper that checks admin status and either shows children, a loading state, or an access‑denied screen.
Protects routes by requiring authentication, showing a loading state or redirecting unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/constants/brand.ts: Defines a constant path for the application's logo asset.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminCheck.ts: Queries the backend to determine whether the current caller has admin privileges.
frontend/src/hooks/useContactInfo.ts: Fetches public contact information from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Provides hooks to fetch and update the current user's profile via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardStatus.ts: Fetches dashboard status from the backend at regular intervals.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication state and helpers using Internet Identity, managing login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useMessageTerminal.ts: Provides hooks to submit messages and fetch all message terminal entries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom styles including deep‑tech theme variables, glass panels, neon accents, and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Displays the admin dashboard with user greeting, system status cards, and contact tools.
frontend/src/pages/BoardPage.tsx: Shows profiles of the organization’s founders with roles and descriptions.
frontend/src/pages/ConnectSupportPage.ts: Provides public messaging and authenticated founder contact sections.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Assembles the landing page sections including hero, narrative, values, and contact.
frontend/src/pages/LegalTechnicalDocsPag: Presents terms of service, IP ownership, and safety audit documentation.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Renders the privacy policy outlining data collection, usage, and security practices.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDeepDivePage.t: Shows a detailed hardware component breakdown of the TT‑1 system with images and descriptions.
frontend/src/pages/TermsOfServicePage.ts: Displays the terms of service covering IP ownership, usage rules, liability, and updates.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to get, store, retrieve, and clear URL and sessionStorage parameters, including support for hash-based routing and persistent URL values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom fonts, colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, requirements, architecture notes, and known issues for the rebuild, including branding rules and feature definitions.
